text: Leonard Rosenman (September 7, 1924 - March 4, 2008) was an American composer. == Life and career == Rosenman was born in Brooklyn, New York. His parents Julius Rosenman and Rose Kantor were Jewish immigrants from Poland. == References == == Other websites == * Category:1924 births Category:2008 deaths Category:American movie score composers Category:Jewish American musicians Category:Musicians from Brooklyn
title: Leonard Rosenman
